reviews.title: Podprumerny UX
reviews.text:
Na uzivatele je prenesena prace, ktera se muze dit na pozadi.
Napriklad pri prvnim prihlaseni ze stare app.
Musim dat heslo (ktere musi byt komplikovane jako do bankovni appky -proc!?).
Dostanu se do stare app - aktivuju face id, ale musim se znovu odhlasit.
Pak se prihlasim a az ted mi to nabidne upgrade do nove app, prijmu.
Ale jsem zde zase odhlaseny (proc si me to proboha nepamatuje!?).
Po prihlaseni se me to zase pta, zda chci face id - ano, zase me to odhlasi, takze poctvrte vyplnuju to komplikovany heslo - hell!
Ale diky, uz to heslo asi nezapomenu.

reviews.text:
Slow, Non-Functional, and Unfixed for Too Long!
The Vodafone app suffers from fundamental problems with speed and functionality that the operator has been ignoring for a long time.
Besides the generally slow response, where loading some screens takes an unacceptable up to 5 seconds, the biggest issue is a persistent error in a critical section.
Whenever I try to open the ""Contract and Installments"" (Smlouva a spl√°tky) section, the app repeatedly, and after a significant delay, displays the error message: ""We apologize, an error has occurred. Please repeat your query."

reviews.id: This crucial part of the application, which should provide users with basic information about their commitments and tariff, has been unavailable and non-functional for a very long time. It is unacceptable that a major telecommunications operator is unable to fix a basic, key bug in its mobile application. This points to a neglect of the user experience and insufficient priority given to technical development.
Until the speed issues and, most importantly, this fundamental contract management error are fixed, the app is unsuitable for active use.
